attributes.action: Open Beauty Salons in line with our Hairdressing neighbours
attributes.additional_details: There is absolutely no reason for beauty salons to be closed whilst the hair industry can trade.  Pubs are open...we are far more sanitized, socially distancing able and less likely to spread this awful virus in our hygienic surroundings.  Why not check every Salon has completed their online risk assessments and authorise them to open if they are COVID compliant.
attributes.background: I own a Salon and not having an opening date has become untenable.  I must be able to manage my clients, staff expectations and manage my business financials
